testcase.name: Verify that user is able to create a contact
testcase.system-out: Given user is present on the login page of the application..................passed When user enters the valid credentials......................................passed And user clicks on the login button.........................................passed Then user is redirected to the application dashboard page...................passed When user hovers over the contacts icon.....................................passed And user clicks on the Contacts plus icon...................................passed Then user is redirected to the Create New Contact page......................passed When user fills first name..................................................passed And user fills the last name................................................passed And user fills the middle name..............................................passed And user searches and selects a company.....................................passed And user searches and selects a tag.........................................passed And user enters the email...................................................passed And user selects the category...............................................passed And user selects the status.................................................passed And user enters the description.............................................passed And user enters the twitter handle..........................................passed And user enters the address.................................................passed And user enter the phone number.............................................passed And user enters the position................................................passed And user enters the department..............................................passed And user searches and selects the supervisor................................passed And user searches and selects the assistant.................................passed And user searches and selects the referred by...............................passed And user selects the Source.................................................passed And user selects do not call, do not text and do not email toggle...........passed And user enters the birthday................................................passed And user enters the identifier and uploads the image........................passed And clicks on save button...................................................passed
